member.name: M:WebP.Touch.WebPCodec.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Decodes the image for given filepath.

member.param: iOS NSData that contains a WebP image.

member.name: M:WebP.Touch.WebPCodec.Decode(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads given Stream and decodes it as an image.
